casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Keith CHEMLEN. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 29, 2016.

Jodi Zils Gagne, Bristol, in support of the petition.

Lisa Herskowitz, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 791, 140 A.3d 347 (2016), is denied.
